songs.title: What Its All About
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Marteen Estevez]
You can wrap a smile up
And leave it by the tree
There ain't a [?]
And there will never come a day around this time of year when I don't think
That everyone deserves to be happy
You can't swipe your card to fall in love
You can't go and return your feelings for someone
And I'll be here around this time when push comes to shove
Reminding you of things you should think of
Everybody loves something by Christmas
Don't let it be the wrong thing that  catch your eye
So if you feel you won't get what you wish for
Remember what you got you'll be alright

[Hook: Kehlani]
This is what it's all about
This is what it's all about
This is what it's all about
This is what it's all about
This is what it's all about
This is what it's all about

[Verse 2: Kehlani]
Why you staring at your phone surrounded by your friends?
You always say that you're alone
You don't have to pretend
Like you don't got somebody that tells you they love you every night
If you opened up your heart you'll see I was right
You ain't gotta be so hard, don't gotta be so cold
You gon' wish you spent this time [?] when you're old
Better act like you know that tomorrow's never guaranteed
Do it for yourself not even me
Now everybody loves something about Christmas
Don't let it be the wrong thing that  catch your eye
So if you feel you won't get what you wish for
Remember what you've got you'll be just fine

[Hook]

[Outro]
But time is now
To write your wrongs
Hold your head
Keep on keeping on
Remind yourself you are strong
Love don't cost
